title: Wout van Aert Still Suffering Pain Ahead of Racing Return, Question Remains Over Tour de France
content:
Olympic Games the only certainty for Van Aert ahead of Tour of Norway comeback, Vingegaard 'improving so fast,' says trainer.

Read the full article at Wout van Aert Still Suffering Pain Ahead of Racing Return, Question Remains Over Tour de France on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
